title: #362 RHOBH:  Finding Dorit
description:
Dorit can't remember her dinner party, but we won't let you forget all the tiny details. Come listen to us dissect the latest Real Housewives of Beverly Hills!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
